JEFFWORLD Simple Quiz Plugin

Question Content

To customize your quiz, use the JSON Array format below. Each question is an object in the array. There is no limit on the number of questions, you must provide 2-4 answer choices per question. 


[
    {
        "question": "What is the largest mammal in the world?",
        "choices": ["Elephant", "Blue Whale", "Giraffe"],
        "correct": 1
    },
    {
        "question": "Which bird is known for its impressive ability to mimic sounds, including human speech?",
        "choices": ["Parrot", "Owl", "Eagle"],
        "correct": 0
    }
]

Structure: The quiz should be represented as a JSON array. Each question is an object within this array.

Each Question Object should include:

  • question: A string representing the quiz question.
  • choices: An array of strings, each string representing a possible answer choice.
  • correct: An integer representing the index of the correct answer in the choices array.

When choosing the correct answer, start from value 0 for the first answer. In the example below, "Blue Whale" is the correct answer, and the "correct" value is 0. If the second answer is correct, use value of 1.

Analytics Value

Set an Analytics Name to send an Analytics Event to Vatom Studio and/or set the quiz instance to prevent re-taking.

Limit Re-Takes

You can prevent users from re-taking the quiz either after completing it with any score, or only after getting all answers correct. Use the Limit Replay After: setting to Any Finish or All Correct and then set an Analytics Name.

The Analytics Name will hold the state of whether the user has taken the quiz or not. If you change the analytics name, users can take the quiz again.

Single Question Quiz

The 'Quiz - Single Question' component allows you to have a single question quiz. This can be a single set question, or it can pick a random question a set provided. By default the single quiz will take the first question in the list.

One More Example Quiz

This quiz has six questions about animals. Note the variety in number of answer choices.


[
    {
        "question": "Which mammal is known to have the most powerful bite in the animal kingdom?",
        "choices": ["Lion", "Hippopotamus", "Grizzly Bear", "Saltwater Crocodile"],
        "correct": 1
    },
    {
        "question": "Sharks have no bones in their bodies.",
        "choices": ["True", "False"],
        "correct": 0
    },
    {
        "question": "Which animal is known for changing its color to blend into its surroundings?",
        "choices": ["Chameleon", "Octopus", "Frog"],
        "correct": 0
    },
    {
        "question": "What is the largest species of penguin?",
        "choices": ["Emperor Penguin", "King Penguin", "Adelie Penguin", "Chinstrap Penguin"],
        "correct": 0
    },
    {
        "question": "Bats are blind.",
        "choices": ["True", "False"],
        "correct": 1
    },
    {
        "question": "Which bird is known for its incredible memory, often hiding food and retrieving it months later?",
        "choices": ["Crow", "Pigeon", "Owl", "Magpie"],
        "correct": 0
    }
]
